bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase Aluminum, custom butted and Aero shaped Down Tube, Integrated Head and Seat Tube w/ Rear wheel recess.
sizes: XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L(56cm), XL(58cm), XXL(60cm)

components.description: A-6 Quaternary phase Aluminum butted seat stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, forged horizontal drop-out w/replaceable Al hanger
FC-770 Fuji Bonded Aero Carbon w/  1 1/8" Alloy Steerer
FSA Gossamer MegaExo w/ Integrated Spindle, 7075 CNC 39/53T Chainring
Shimano Dura Ace TT Bar End Type, 20-speed
Oval W-530 Aero Alloy Clincher Wheelset,  30mm rim - 700c
Oval RB-500 Forged Alloy, Dual Pivot w/Cartridge Pads
V.P. 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow Alloy 25mm spacer
Profile T2 wing base bar with T1+ extension
